attributes.action: A Petition for an Inclusive/Transparent BREXIT Process to the Unite the Country
attributes.additional_details: I urge the government and all political parties to back this petition and help unite the nation and ensure a proper process for BREXIT. This is NOT about arguing to be in/out of the EU but rather an inclusive process to get us where we want to be while maintaining & protecting both our unity and our pride as a nation - that’s the real context of this petition.
attributes.background:
1.	Release/make public all documents related to BREXIT impact assessment papers while indicating the date these have been completed.
2.	Commitment by government to suspend negotiations if impact of BREXIT is deemed detrimental to the interest of the nation and seek expert unbiased review of them.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what exactly you mean by an "inclusive/transparent brexit process". 

If you want the Government to publish its own impact/risk assessments, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200634 

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
